Class LanternItem

java.lang.Object

gears.sidescroller.world.items.LanternItem
All Implemented Interfaces:
JsonSerializable, Collidable, Illuminating
public class LanternItem extends AbstractItem implements Illuminating
a LanternItem can be picked up and provides light

  • Method Details

    • doAction

      public boolean doAction(Player whoUsedItem)
      Description copied from class: AbstractItem
      This method is invoked whenever the user selects this AbstractItem from their inventory. Subclasses should override this method to implement behavior which should happen when the Player uses this AbstractItem. Note that an AbstractItem may be used in an Area different from its own, so use whoUsedItem.getArea() to reference the Area it is used in, not this.getArea(). Note that the AbstractItem is responsible for removing itself from the Player's inventory, if appropriate.
      Specified by:
      doAction in class AbstractItem
      Parameters:
      whoUsedItem - the Player who used this AbstractItem
      Returns:
      whether or not this could perform its action
